dict.string: Reference paper sizes and device viewport widths

IFS=$'\n'
file="sizes/iso.csv"
echo "<?xml version='1.0'?><items>" for media in $(grep -i "^{query}" "${file}"); do name="$(echo ${media} | sed 's/^\(.*\),\(.*\),\(.*\)$/\1/')" size="$(echo ${media} | sed 's/^\(.*\),\(.*\),\(.*\)$/\2 mm | \3 in/')" echo "<item uid='${name}' valid='no' autocomplete='${name}'>" echo "<title>${name}</title>" echo "<subtitle>${size}</subtitle>" echo "<icon>icon.png</icon>" echo "</item>" done echo "</items>"

IFS=$'\n'
file="sizes/na.csv"
echo "<?xml version='1.0'?><items>" for media in $(grep -i "^{query}" "${file}"); do name="$(echo ${media} | sed 's/^\(.*\),\(.*\),\(.*\)$/\1/')" size="$(echo ${media} | sed 's/^\(.*\),\(.*\),\(.*\)$/\2 mm | \3 in/')" echo "<item uid='${name}' valid='no' autocomplete='${name}'>" echo "<title>${name}</title>" echo "<subtitle>${size}</subtitle>" echo "<icon>icon.png</icon>" echo "</item>" done echo "</items>"

IFS=$'\n'
file="sizes/jis.csv"
echo "<?xml version='1.0'?><items>" for media in $(grep -i "^{query}" "${file}"); do name="$(echo ${media} | sed 's/^\(.*\),\(.*\),\(.*\)$/\1/')" size="$(echo ${media} | sed 's/^\(.*\),\(.*\),\(.*\)$/\2 mm | \3 in/')" echo "<item uid='${name}' valid='no' autocomplete='${name}'>" echo "<title>${name}</title>" echo "<subtitle>${size}</subtitle>" echo "<icon>icon.png</icon>" echo "</item>" done echo "</items>"

IFS=$'\n'
file="sizes/ansi.csv"
echo "<?xml version='1.0'?><items>" for media in $(grep -i "^{query}" "${file}"); do name="$(echo ${media} | sed 's/^\(.*\),\(.*\),\(.*\)$/\1/')" size="$(echo ${media} | sed 's/^\(.*\),\(.*\),\(.*\)$/\2 mm | \3 in/')" echo "<item uid='${name}' valid='no' autocomplete='${name}'>" echo "<title>${name}</title>" echo "<subtitle>${size}</subtitle>" echo "<icon>icon.png</icon>" echo "</item>" done echo "</items>"

IFS=$'\n'
file="sizes/arch.csv"
echo "<?xml version='1.0'?><items>" for media in $(grep -i "^{query}" "${file}"); do name="$(echo ${media} | sed 's/^\(.*\),\(.*\),\(.*\)$/\1/')" size="$(echo ${media} | sed 's/^\(.*\),\(.*\),\(.*\)$/\2 mm | \3 in/')" echo "<item uid='${name}' valid='no' autocomplete='${name}'>" echo "<title>${name}</title>" echo "<subtitle>${size}</subtitle>" echo "<icon>icon.png</icon>" echo "</item>" done echo "</items>"

IFS=$'\n'
file="sizes/viewport.csv"
echo "<?xml version='1.0'?><items>" for media in $(grep -i ".*{query}.*" "${file}"); do name="$(echo ${media} | sed 's/^\(.*\),\(.*\),\(.*\),\(.*\)$/\1 · \2/')" size="$(echo ${media} | sed 's/^\(.*\),\(.*\),\(.*\),\(.*\)$/\3 x \4 (Portrait width x Landscape width)/')" echo "<item uid='${name}' valid='no' autocomplete='${name}'>" echo "<title>${name}</title>" echo "<subtitle>${size}</subtitle>" echo "<icon>icon.png</icon>" echo "</item>" done echo "</items>"
Search by a device’s name, brand, OS, or resolution
Viewport sizes for various mobile devices
